title: PremiumExpression
description: This class corresponds to the FpML Premium.model group for representing the option premium when expressed in a way other than an amount.

pricePerOption.description: The amount of premium to be paid expressed as a function of the number of options.

percentageOfNotional.description: The amount of premium to be paid expressed as a percentage of the notional value of the transaction. A percentage of 5% would be expressed as 0.05.
